briefTitle: Efficacy, Safety and Tolerability of Multiple Doses of Valsartan in Children With Hypertension With or Without CKD
officialTitle: A 6 Week, Randomized, Multicenter, Double-blind, Double-dummy Study to Evaluate the Dose Response of Valsartan on Blood Pressure Reduction in Children 1-5 Years Old With Hypertension, With or Without Chronic Kidney Disease, Followed by a 20 Week Open-label Titration Phase
conditions: Pediatric Hypertension With or Without CKD
summary: To assess efficacy, safety and tolerability of valsartan when comparing two doses of valsartan in reducing and controlling blood pressure in children with hypertension with or without CKD.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Mean Systolic Blood Pressure (MSBP) at Week 6 Endpoint
